title: Five Nights at Freddy’s: Sister Location Free Download
description:
Welcome to Circus Baby’s Pizza World, where family fun and interactivity go beyond anything you’ve seen at those *other* pizza places! With cutting-edge animatronic entertainers that will knock your kids’ socks off, as well as customized pizza catering, no party is complete without Circus Baby and the gang Now hiring: Late night technician. Must enjoy cramped spaces and be comfortable around active machinery.
Not responsible for death or dismemberment . If before the night the heroes spent sitting in one place and watching the entrances to the room, now everything is a little cooler. Now you will roam the dark locations in the first-person view, look for animatronics , shock them and complete tasks that will be given by a voice called Hand Unit. What’s most interesting is that you have to complete tasks in dark and rather gloomy locations. The moments when you have to climb the ventilation and look for escaped animatronics are especially scary.

system_requirements.Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
